chunks.original_latin:
Fragmentum   dubium. In quo omnes peccaverunt. In quo, id est, in
Adam omnes peccaverunt . . . . . Manifestum est in
Adam peccasse, quasi in massa. Ipse enim per peccatum
corruptus, omnes quos genuit, nati sunt sub
peccato.
chunks.cleaned_english_translation: A doubtful fragment. In which all have sinned. This means that in Adam, all have sinned. It's clear that everyone sinned in Adam, almost as if we were all part of one whole. Because Adam himself was corrupted by sin, he caused everyone born from him to be under sin.
